title: Man shot at New Castle playground
content:
NEW CASTLE, Pa. -
New Castle police are looking for a suspect after a man was shot.
Police tell 21 News the victim was shot Tuesday night at 8:30 p.m., at a playground at the corner of West North and Lowry Streets.
A home on West Washington Street, about a half a block from the playground, was also hit by gunfire.
The unidentified shooting victim was taken to UPMC Jameson hospital in New Castle, but his condition is not known at this time.
Police are looking for a black jeep belonging to the suspected shooter, that's often seen in the Farrell area.
Anyone with information on this shooting is asked to call New Castle police.
